mapper.insert: insert into reserve (roomtype, bedtype, staydate, reservecheckin, reservecheckout, userid, reservenum, reserveadult, reservekid, reservebaby, reserverequire, reservestate, hotelprice) values (#{roomType},#{bedType},#{stayDate},#{reserveCheckin}, #{reserveCheckout},#{userId},#{reserveNum},#{reserveAdult},#{reserveKid},#{reserveBaby},#{reserveRequire},#{reserveState},#{hotelPrice})
mapper.select: select DISTINCT a.*,b.* FROM hotel a left outer join (select distinct roomtype, bedtype, peoplecnt,roomname from (select distinct roomtype,bedtype,peoplecnt,roomname from(select * from room where roomnum not in (select DISTINCT roomnum from reserve where (staydate >= #{reserveCheckin} and staydate <= #{reserveCheckout}) and reserve.reservecheckout != #{reserveCheckin} and reserve.reservecheckin != #{reserveCheckout}) order by roomnum asc))) b on a.hotelname = b.roomname
select * from hotel where hotelname like #{hotelName}||'%'
